entries.rationale: Harness tool composition must use OpenCode tool registry seam.
Harness lifecycle composition runs through OpenCode plugin hooks.
Harness archetype loading composes with OpenCode skill loading.
Harness session operations compose through OpenCode SDK/server surfaces.
Engine session capability override via RENKEI_SESSION_CAPABILITIES JSON policy. Level 3 seam created by item-012. Enables engine to control child session TUI behaviour.
